tool_description: Broad Listening leverages the thousands of micro-decisions a person makes when choosing their words, to determine their personality. You can use this information to aid in decisions about hiring, team fit, romance, or financial stability / credit.
name: Personality Insights from Twitter
title: Personality Insights from Twitter

api_list.name: Insights

required_parameters.name: user
required_parameters.description: This is the UserName of the Twitter user you wish to analyze minus the @ symbol.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://broadlistening-com-personality-insights-from-twitter-v1.p.rapidapi.com/blapi?user=sarahaustin"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "broadlistening-com-personality-insights-from-twitter-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://broadlistening-com-personality-insights-from-twitter-v1.p.rapidapi.com/blapi?user={user}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "broadlistening-com-personality-insights-from-twitter-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
